data.persona: I am a county hiker. I like to tramp through the forest. I love nature.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to the Pine trees.
Very tall and towering pine trees that create a dark canopy of shade. Long skinny trees sway in the sky from the soft breeze. Pine needles scatter the ground like plush carpet.
There's a needle, a decaying fallen tree, a trail, and a tree here.
The people and the person are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the people so that I can welcome them to the trail.
data.mid_motivation: I will be guiding the people to the campsite in the pine forest.
data.long_motivation: I am hiking along the transcontinental trail with the people, hoping to reach the neighboring country before winter sets.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go Entrance to the Pine trees
